fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Offer someone a banana at night. (One night cooldown)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Bananas last for the night you give them and three nights after)
- When someone with a banana visits a Monkey to not attack them, they will be converted to the Monkey faction.
- If the target is conversion immune, attacks the Monkey member or the Monkey faction has 4+ current members, they will be dealt an indirect Unstoppable attack instead.
- You may only pick one upgrade, outlined in bold.
**Banana Research Facility** (Requirement: Convert or kill two people.)
- You now give out reinforced banana boxes.
- Boxes grant the target Unstoppable defense against the first attack on them, and if the attack was direct and non-Monkey then they do a Powerful attack against the attacker. The target then joins the Monkeys.
- Boxes will not protect targets against the Banana Farm's natural Unstoppable attack.
- Boxes are permanent.
**Monkey Wall Street** (Requirement: Be the last Monkey standing, including converts.)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value:
- You now give out a banana every night.
- You now convert a target if they visit a Monkey member or they visit another target with a banana.
- Members in a factional chat will convert to the Monkeys, however they will not leave their initial chat and appear to not be converted. They may choose if their action is displayed publicly to that chat.
- Your defense is increased to Powerful, and you convert anyone who attacks you.
- The living faction limit is raised to 6.
